posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for? Moderator in the Jail server.

2) How old are you? (if you prefer to say this in private, just ask): REDACTED

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone): England GMT 00:00

4) Current In-Game Name: |¦| Creamy Cracker |¦|

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community page: STEAM_0:0:36665600 01:47 176 0  http://steamcommunity.com/id/Creamy_Cracker

6) Email Address:REDACTED@REDACTED

7) How long have you been involved:Played on the Jail server for 2 months, Donated and been VIP for one month.

8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team: I am a very frequent player on the Jail server and believe that i can bring order to the server when there are no other mods or admins on the server for example people RDMing or players being AFK.
9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?: Like i said above, i would be able to bring order to players not following the rules which was not possible when i was a VIP because a votekick needs to be approved by an admin.

10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience: I have a total of 123.6 hours on garry's mod and some CS:S experience too.

11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server?:no

12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it?:i have a microphone and use it pretty much every time i am on the server.

13) Any other Comments or information you can provide: am i still able to donate to the server and if so what would happen to my donation?
